resources.string: Choose the timeperiod of your images
The positions of the following pictures are not saved. Return to add information to these pictures. The other pictures can be found in the map.
You can mark a place by tapping in the map or searching for a name of it.

Do you want to save the coordinates to the chosen picture? Current geoinformation saved to the picture will be overwritten and can not be restored from other apps! A backup for the last 3 GPS data will be stored for each picture locally on the device.

Thank you for downloading this app. 
If you have any idea for improvement feel free to contact me via mail by using the left button. 

Further, you could help me by giving me a good rating on google-play (google-plus account needed)
The folder of the chosen picture does not support saving geo information.
Choose pictures which were taken on the same place like the regarded picture (yellow marker on map)
Android doesn\'t allow the App to change this file. Only picture stored under the DCIM camera folder can be updated.
There was a problem and the new coordinates were not saved.
Click on the buttons to get an explanation of theire functions. To closing this introduction and going back to the normal surface of the app click on the questionmark again.
Select pictures on your phone / tablet depending on the capture date.
If you have selected pictures, this button will show you a map with theire positions on it.
This button allows you to select pictures from folders on your device per hand.
Here you can contact the developer or rate this app on google play.
To get an introduction, click on the questionmark on the top of this page
